snippet: SCHAFFER--Susan Gyory. Survived by husband Jerry, children Judi, Steven and Michael. Auschwitz survivor, Manager of Crazy Glue. Loved her many grandchildren. Services Friday, 11am at "The Riverside", 76 St. and Amsterdam Ave....

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SCHAFFER, SUSAN GYORY

lead_paragraph: SCHAFFER--Susan Gyory. Survived by husband Jerry, children Judi, Steven and Michael. Auschwitz survivor, Manager of Crazy Glue. Loved her many grandchildren. Services Friday, 11am at "The Riverside", 76 St. and Amsterdam Ave.
